    • addButtonAction

      public void addButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method adds a part to the associated parts table
      Parameters:
      event - handles the add button being clicked RUNTIME ERROR: Would only add a part once. Fixed by changing method to an if-else statement and used the setItems() method

    • searchPartsFieldAction

      public void searchPartsFieldAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method searches a part in the allparts table. Populates all parts if the search field is empty
      Parameters:
      event - handles user interaction

    • validateMin

      public boolean validateMin(int min, int max)
      This method validates there is no minimum below zero and the max is not below the minimum
      Parameters:
      min - minimum value for product
      max - maximum value for product
      Returns:
      returns string if check is invalid

    • validateInventory

      public boolean validateInventory(int min, int max, int stock)
      This method validates the inventory by ensuring the stock is no less than min and no greater than max
      Parameters:
      max - maximum value for product
      min - minimum value for product
      stock - number of products in stock
